!Count Magician: Cast your eyes upon the results of this magicial research conducted by Mystics Guild. You can make use of a magical field capable of teleporting a clan member though a crown, as well as magic that provides special abilities to your low-ranking soldiers. We even have a Talisman, a magical crystal filled with power. We have also purchased certain items directly from the Elves' mystical merchant. How may I serve you?
[npc_%objectId%_gotoleader|Move though the magic field.]
